name: LIFE
description: Levels Protocol is the first evolutionary token protocol on Solana, redefining digital assets by enabling tokens to grow and evolve autonomously through smart contract-driven milestones. As market cap increases, tokens transform in real-time - updating their names, symbols, and metadata on-chain to reflect the shared achievements and progress of their communities. This seamless evolution, powered entirely by Solanaâ€™s decentralized infrastructure, happens without manual intervention, making each token a living representation of belief and momentum. Through the Levels Launchpad dApp, anyone can create their own evolving tokens, turning every price milestone into a gamified celebration of growth and success, where the journey itself becomes part of the reward.
